entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:41 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:41 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
